post_title: Traveling through Bucharest and could use some advise.

comments.author: cage_nicolascage
comments.body: Hey mate, this subreddit is a bit under the radar. Not much action going on here unfortunately. You should try posting in r\romania instead. That is where the action is. Anyway, how old are you and what is your skillset?

comments.author: None
comments.body: Am going to Romania on September 27 to October 1 alone. I love to explore the beautiful city of Bucharest with limited time. Can someone accompany exploring the city?
